synopsis:
North America release of Shin-chan.

Laugh to hide your tears… He’s rude. He’s crass. He’s unbelievably obnoxious and he likes showing his @$$. He’s Shin, and he’s the star of this train wreck. From superhero sell-outs, hotties and half-tards to bunny abuse and dirty old men, Shin chan’s packed with sweet dead piggy goodness – So sweet it would make an anorexic eat! Learn the fate of Whitey, poke fun at Mitzi’s breasts or follow along on Ench-Man’s quests – With 78 outrageous uncensored episodes the possibilities are endless! Wanna play a game of hide and drink? Falling off the wagon is always better with company! Shin chan: Get yours or die!?!
